Docs.summary: Represents a method to be called when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SendOrPostCallback represents a callback method that you want to execute when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context. Create the delegate by passing your callback method to the SendOrPostCallback constructor. Your method must have the signature shown here.
